name: clickn-circles
title: Clickn' Circles
description: A game made in pygame, and then again in Unity. A game to click circles. Don't press the red one, run the timed trials and see how many you can click in the time frame!

name: ash-aldeburgh
title: Ash Smoked Fishes Website
description: A site I made a site for my GrandFather using NextJS and Tailwind CSS. It's a site for a fish smoking company.
